strapiPost.title: Trotting To The Thanksgiving Table
strapiPost.content:
For some of you, this Thursday wont only include a turkey, but also a trot.

  • Distance: Turkey-Trot "fun runs" are happening all over NWA this Thursday for Thanksgiving. With multiple distances to choose from these family friendly runs make for a fun tradition.
  • Support: You have the 11th Annual SHS Bulldog Football Turkey Trot in Springdale, a Turkey Trot-n-Trek at Lake Fayetteville, and the 14th Annual Turkey Trot for Heroes in Rogers.

For a list of state-wide races, click HERE.
